attributes.action: Donald  trump petition  30000 votes scrapped a cover up so this was not debated
attributes.additional_details: if 30000 votes were from the same source as stated it would have needed 30000 emails and conformation I would like this investigated because if these 30000 votes were removed so it did not have to be debated in parliament then it makes this whole voting system pointless and if it was wrong then what else has been altered so it would not have to be debated.
attributes.background: I would like an investigation how 30000 votes were scrapped so the goverment did not have to debate this in parliament.

rejection.details:
The petition you refer to was debated on 18 January. The motion debated was “That this House has considered e-petitions 114003 and 114907 relating to the exclusion of Donald Trump from the UK”. E-petition 114907 calls on the Government not to ban Mr Trump from the UK.

You can find out more about the debate here:

http://www.parliament.uk/business/committees/committees-a-z/commons-select/petitions-committee/news-parliament-2015/exclusion_of_donald_trump_from_the_uk_petitions_debate/
